languages.text: "Посмотри правде в глаза, Ханн Кассини. Ты не можешь сойти с этого корабля. Скверна хаос-бомбы поразила тебя, хоть и не так сильно, как остальных. И ты это знаешь, я вижу по твоим реакциям".
"Face it, Hann Cassini. You can't leave this ship. The corruption of the Chaos bomb did afflict you, albeit not as strongly as the others. And you know this, I can tell by your reaction."
languages.original_text: "Посмотри правде в глаза, Ханн Кассини. Ты не можешь сойти с этого корабля. Скверна хаос-бомбы поразила тебя, хоть и не так сильно, как остальных. И ты это знаешь, я вижу по твоим реакциям".

traits.locale_text: "Face it, Hann Cassini. You can't leave this ship. The corruption of the Chaos bomb did afflict you, albeit not as strongly as the others. And you know this, I can tell by your reaction."
"Face it, Hann Cassini. You can't leave this ship. The corruption of the Chaos bomb did afflict you, albeit not as strongly as the others. And you know this, I can tell by your reaction."
"Face it, Hann Cassini. You can't leave this ship. The corruption of the Chaos bomb did afflict you, albeit not as strongly as the others. And you know this, I can tell by your reaction."
"Face it, Hann Cassini. You can't leave this ship. The corruption of the Chaos bomb did afflict you, albeit not as strongly as the others. And you know this, I can tell by your reaction."
"Face it, Hann Cassini. You can't leave this ship. The corruption of the Chaos bomb did afflict you, albeit not as strongly as the others. And you know this, I can tell by your reaction."

languages.text: 「認めろ、ハン・カッシーニ。お前はこの船から降りることはできない。他の者たちほどないにせよ、渾沌の爆弾に侵されている。お前もそれを知っているはずだ。反応を見ればわかる」
languages.original_text: "Face it, Hann Cassini. You can't leave this ship. The corruption of the Chaos bomb did afflict you, albeit not as strongly as the others. And you know this, I can tell by your reaction."

traits.locale_text: 「認めろ、ハン・カッシーニ。お前はこの船から降りることはできない。他の者たちほどないにせよ、渾沌の爆弾に侵されている。お前もそれを知っているはずだ。反応を見ればわかる」

languages.text: “面对现实吧，汉恩·卡西尼。你没办法离开这艘船，混沌炸弹的腐化切实地折磨着你。尽管你的表现没有其他人那么强烈，但你心知肚明，而且我从你的反应就能看出来。”
languages.original_text: "Face it, Hann Cassini. You can't leave this ship. The corruption of the Chaos bomb did afflict you, albeit not as strongly as the others. And you know this, I can tell by your reaction."

traits.locale_text: “面对现实吧，汉恩·卡西尼。你没办法离开这艘船，混沌炸弹的腐化切实地折磨着你。尽管你的表现没有其他人那么强烈，但你心知肚明，而且我从你的反应就能看出来。”

languages.text: «Admítalo, Hann Cassini. No puede dejar la nave. La corrupción de la bomba de Caos llegó a afectarle, aunque menos que a los demás. Y lo sabe. Su reacción no deja lugar a dudas».
languages.original_text: "Face it, Hann Cassini. You can't leave this ship. The corruption of the Chaos bomb did afflict you, albeit not as strongly as the others. And you know this, I can tell by your reaction."

traits.locale_text: «Admítalo, Hann Cassini. No puede dejar la nave. La corrupción de la bomba de Caos llegó a afectarle, aunque menos que a los demás. Y lo sabe. Su reacción no deja lugar a dudas».

languages.text: « Ouvrez les yeux, Hann Cassini : vous ne quitterez pas ce vaisseau. La bombe du Chaos vous a corrompu ; à un degré moindre que vos camarades, certes, mais vous le savez, je le vois à votre réaction. »
languages.original_text: "Face it, Hann Cassini. You can't leave this ship. The corruption of the Chaos bomb did afflict you, albeit not as strongly as the others. And you know this, I can tell by your reaction."

traits.locale_text: « Ouvrez les yeux, Hann Cassini : vous ne quitterez pas ce vaisseau. La bombe du Chaos vous a corrompu ; à un degré moindre que vos camarades, certes, mais vous le savez, je le vois à votre réaction. »

languages.text: "Gesteht es Euch ein, Hann Cassini. Ihr könnt dieses Schiff nicht verlassen. Die Verderbnis der Chaosbombe hat Euch ergriffen, wenn auch nicht so stark wie die anderen. Und Ihr wisst das, wie ich Eurer Reaktion entnehme."
languages.original_text: "Face it, Hann Cassini. You can't leave this ship. The corruption of the Chaos bomb did afflict you, albeit not as strongly as the others. And you know this, I can tell by your reaction."

traits.locale_text: "Gesteht es Euch ein, Hann Cassini. Ihr könnt dieses Schiff nicht verlassen. Die Verderbnis der Chaosbombe hat Euch ergriffen, wenn auch nicht so stark wie die anderen. Und Ihr wisst das, wie ich Eurer Reaktion entnehme."

languages.text: "Kabullen artık Hann Cassini. Bu gemiyi terk edemezsin. Kaos bombasının yozlaşması, diğerleri kadar olmasa bile seni de etkilemiş. Bunu sen de biliyorsun, tepkilerinden bunu anlayabiliyorum."
languages.original_text: "Face it, Hann Cassini. You can't leave this ship. The corruption of the Chaos bomb did afflict you, albeit not as strongly as the others. And you know this, I can tell by your reaction."

traits.locale_text: "Kabullen artık Hann Cassini. Bu gemiyi terk edemezsin. Kaos bombasının yozlaşması seni de diğerleri kadar olmasa da etkilemiş. Bunu sen de biliyorsun, tepkilerinden bunu anlayabiliyorum."
